statements: SELECT * FROM comedy_content;
SELECT title, type, author FROM comedy_content WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title, type FROM comedy_content WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, content FROM comedy_content WHERE type = 'article' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, publish_date FROM comedy_content WHERE publish_date <= '2021-12-31' AND author = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM comedy_content ORDER BY publish_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, type, author FROM comedy_content WHERE type='review' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, author FROM comedy_content WHERE author='John Doe' AND publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM comedy_content WHERE type='interview' AND publish_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(publish_date) AS latest_publish_date, MIN(publish_date) AS earliest_publish_date FROM comedy_content;
SELECT * FROM articles
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1
SELECT author, title FROM articles ORDER BY author DESC
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3
SELECT title, reviewer_name FROM reviews ORDER BY review_id ASC
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE author='Alice Smith' ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating), reviewer_name FROM reviews GROUP BY reviewer_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT title, rating FROM articles INNER JOIN reviews ON articles.article_id = reviews.review_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT interviewer_name, transcript FROM interviews WHERE comedian_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT review_id, rating, review_comment FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 8;
SELECT article_id, title, author, content FROM articles WHERE author = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT article_id, title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT review_id, reviewer, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 5;
SELECT * FROM interviews WHERE comedian_name = 'Dave Chappelle';
SELECT article_id, author, content FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE published_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT interview_id, guest_name, interview_date FROM interviews ORDER BY interview_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, title, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author, published_date FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, title, rating, reviewer, review_date FROM reviews WHERE rating = 5 AND review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_id, title, author, published_date FROM articles WHERE author LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY author, published_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT review_content, rating FROM reviews WHERE article_id = 2;
SELECT guest_name, interview_content FROM interviews ORDER BY interview_id DESC;
SELECT author_name FROM authors WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE title LIKE 'The%' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT review_content, rating FROM reviews WHERE article_id = 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, content, review_content, rating FROM articles a JOIN reviews r ON a.article_id = r.article_id;
SELECT author_name, category_name FROM authors JOIN categories ON authors.author_id = categories.category_id;
